titles.title: Expressing support for designation of a "Free Enterprise Education Week" to encourage elementary and secondary schools, institutions of higher education, and small and large businesses to educate students about free enterprise.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 4/2/2009--Introduced. Supports designation of a Free Enterprise Education Week to encourage elementary and secondary schools, institutions of higher education, and businesses in this country to educate students about the free enterprise system.
